nodes.bodyText: Any reason you used HBaseTableDescriptor.HIGH_TABLE_PRIORITY instead of HConstants.ADMIN_QOS or HConstants.HIGH_QOS ?

getTxn() originally used HConstants.HIGH_QOS. DB-10230 introduced HBaseTableDescriptor.HIGH_TABLE_PRIORITY/NORMAL_TABLE_PRIORITY which are mapped to HConstants.ADMIN_QOS/NORMAL_QOS. I reused HBaseTableDescriptor.HIGH_TABLE_PRIORITY for other transaction RPCs for consistency.
